      Methods in game.entity that return Point 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Point[] Entity.getCorners()
      This uses this entities width, height, position and angle in order to return an array containing the coordinates of this entities corners in the order: top-left, top-right, bottom-right, bottom-left.
